name: Djinni

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit  range 90 ft.  one target. Hit: 35 (10d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Scimitar Sweep (1/Day, Giant Form Only)
actions.desc: The djinn makes a scimitar attack against each creature of its choice within its reach.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The djinnis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, wind wall, 3/day each: creation, major image, tongues, wind walk, 1/day each: conjure elemental (air elemental only), control weather, create food and water (10 supply), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Air only)
